body.name: Oraimo Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6-in-1 Stick Vacuum with 2200mAh*6 Rechargeable Battery, Vacuum Cleaner for Home with Self-Standing, Handheld Vacuum for Home Kitchen Hard Floor Carpet Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 13 mins
features: 【Enough Suction】Oraimo cordless vacuum cleaner has 2 suction modes, "strong" for large particles and stubborn stains, and "standard" means better battery life. Effortlessly removes dirt, debris, dust, pet hair, and stubborn dirt, leaving no residue after vacuuming. No residue will remain after suction.

【Self-standing, Easy to Store】Oraimo vacuum cleaner for home is free-standing, with no need to drill holes in the wall for hanging, no need to lean on the table, and no risk of falling. With an accessory storage holder, no need to worry about losing accessories.

【Multiple Accessories】 The cordless handheld vacuum comes with a crevice nozzle for corner cleaning and a brush nozzle for sofa and keyboards. It is a stick vacuum cleaner and a portable hand held vacuum for home and car. The 800 ML large container is practical for daily cleaning.

【Detachable Battery】The stick vacuum for pet offers up to 30 minutes run time for whole house cleaning(180㎡). The 2200mAh*6 detachable battery can be easily charged anywhere. Please fully charge before first use.

【User-Friendly】To extend the battery life of the cordless vacuum, we designed a 3-second soft start. High-efficiency filtration can block 99.99% of dust and fine particles to protect your and your family's health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Small Yet Powerful Beast!
reviews.reviewText: OMG where do I begin. I love this vacuum. It is small and lightweight. Do not let the fact that it is small and cordless deter you from buying it. It is very powerful and great for hardwood floors and area rugs. I do not have carpet so I can't say how well it will work on them, but it works great on my area rugs. The battery does only work for about 35 minutes, but it charges very quickly. I have pets so I use it every day multiple times a day and no more pet hair everywhere. It comes with a curtain/upholstery attachment and a crevice attachment. The handle is adjustable. It also comes with 4 of the Hepa filters, which you can rinse off and reuse. The top attachment can be removed and used as a hand vac for smaller spaces with the crevice attachment. I think it is well priced and as I said I love it. I just need to find a replacement battery which i have not seen available yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, lightweight cordless vacuum. Worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was looking for a cordless vacuum that would hold up to the dirt of 5 kids and 4 dogs. I've had it for 2 months now, and let's just say, it gets used hard. Like 5-10 times a day! It's what I use for daily cleaning. I do have to say it doesn't deep clean like my corded one, but it's awesome for daily clean up. I vacuum the entire upstairs, which is where the dogs sleep, so lots of hair, and it's a real powerhouse.I definitely recommend this vacuum. I did purchase the warranty as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My friend put me on this
reviews.reviewText: Been looking around for affordable wireless but functional vacuums. Was doing research for black Friday when a friend told me of this vacuum she purchased a year ago. This is exactly what I need for my little apartment. It's a pretty powerful and light with a nice swivel that can get into little space under my couch. And the suction grabs all the hairs I shed, even the ones on my small rug. The transition from vinal floor to carpet is smooth and I can easily switch to the handheld to get in the crevices that the vacuum can't get into. The fact it comes with 4 filters tells me this company isn't stingy on making sure you get a good quality vacuum that can capture all the dust that can give you the sneezes while dusting and cleaning. And honestly will keep me as a long time buyer for this brand. The attachments are very helpful and allow me to get in-between my sliding windows where dust can form while the brush helps with getting the lint off my bathroom fan vent which is 👌🏽I do however have some cons: battery time. I'm lucky, my apartment is pretty small, so more than 30 or 45min of vacuuming isn't a thing BUT, if I want a good vacuuming with the highest suction setting, the battery goes quickly, like in 15/20 min. Other than that, I can easily plug it in to charge which gives me a lil break on the clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have had this vacuum for about a month, and the battery no longer holds a charge :(. Aside from that, the vacuum was really great! Very powerful suction, great attachments for a variety of reason, and is able to get into little nooks and crannies. However, the life of the battery (less than one month) is frustrating due to its inability to hold a charge after one full charge.UPDATE: I’ve reached out to the sellers and they replaced my vacuum. The new battery functions properly and holds a charge! With a working battery, this vacuum is a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m in love!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this stick vac. I bought it during prime days to replace an old stick vac I had bought 3 years ago that broke. This one is far superior to my old one. Features that I love are: it actually sucks debris and hair off all of the surfaces in my home, it stands up on its own, the accessories attach right to it so they aren’t laying in a closet somewhere, the battery pops off and can be charged independently, it’s easy to use, lightweight, it has led lights on the floor brush roll, I can go on and on. It only took about an hour to fully charge the first time. The battery is down 1 bar since a full charge after one day. But I can’t stop vacuuming everything in my house. It even picked up grass that was stuck on to my entry mats. My big vacuum can barely do that. This is prob not a vacuum to do a whole house full of carpet or heavy duty deep cleaning for hours but if you want something for in between guests, crumbs from your kids, those hairball tumbleweeds from pets or whatever other annoying messes that happen…this vac is amazing. I would 100% buy this again and recommend it to others. Can’t go wrong with this one, buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is easy to use the battery lasts for multi uses

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Battery dies quickly, does not pickup well
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this back in August, but didn't actually unbox and use it until October.While it is extremely lightweight and easy to maneuver, the battery (fully charged) does not last more than an hour, if that. The suction is not very strong to begin with, even on the highest setting, but after 2 months the stick vacuum doesn't pick up AT ALL! I've had to resort back to using my full-sized vacuum cleaner. If you are looking for something to use frequently to vacuum multiple rooms and/or furniture, you should probably invest in a more reputable (and more expensive) rechargeable vacuum cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can clean most of my 1600 sqft house on one charge
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is amazing! Light weight, takes up little space, charges fast, and I can clean almost my entire house on one charge. It does get clogged easily, but I have a very furry dog and have never had a vacuum that doesn’t get clogged by her hair. It’s easy to clean out so this isn’t a big deal. It has 2 suction settings but I never need to use the higher suction setting. I’ve been using it for at least 3 months and it’s probably my favorite vacuum I’ve ever had.

reviews.reviewerName: Great sounding little radios I’m pleased with this purcjase
reviews.reviewText: I just received this product earlier today and couldn’t wait to write up a review after using it.the box it came in was really lightweight and cool and I wondered ( is this really the vacuum?)but surprisingly, yes it was !!The items in box were situated and packaged nicely & securely in place. I loved the look of the product the minute I saw it.Firstly, This vacuum was really light to handle, and very easy to assemble. I have carpel tunnel syndrome in both hands- so it was important to me that this vacuum not be too heavy to manover, or push , awkward to store or difficult to use. The attachments have an easy clip attached to them that snaps easily together.I vacuumed my carpets, luxury vinyl flooring, basement steps, and even the inside my car with it. Let me tell you ... I was impressed with the power of this thing, despite its small & lightweight size. It’s not bulky heavy awkward or very noisy. But remember to note: it’s not a shop vac !I waited for about 20 minutes to charge up the battery- when the 3 solid bars were flashing it was ready for use( so Not too long to charge at all ) I did all my vacuuming with it in about 20 minutes. I used the slim crevice attachment for the corners, crevices, under my furniture. And on the basement stairs. Trust me it works perfectly and I was very happy with the results ( like the amount of pet hair/ dirt/ debris it collected) I collected a big ball of fur/ dirt & debris I didn’t even know I had on my floors.Read / review & follow instructions if you want optimal use if this vacuum. and I’m sure you will not be disappointed with the results.Follow directions.It stands on its on in my broom closet or you can screw the attachment base into a wall. It turns off and in really quickly once charged.It’s just what I needed to pick up my dog / cat hair loose debris, and car floor debris on carpets.The battery base and attachments lightly snap into place and the slim nozzle ends did a really good in the crevices and corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice little hoover, so lightweight I can carry upstairs with no problem, suction power great, especially pet hair. Comes with brush and crevice tools, and wall bracket . Runs times good, but could be longer but enough to do what u need to do. So handy , and you're not getting tangled in cords or heavy hoovers that u have to take upstairs .

Für den krass günstigen Preis von um die ~100€ (Reduzierung von Amazon) ist die Qualität so so gut! 3 Aufsätze, sogar Licht und schnelles Aufladen. Er steht von allein. Er kann vieles, was die meisten Dyson oder teureren Produkte im gleichen Sortiment auch können. Er saugt kräftig und macht mich einfsch glücklich, endlich einen so guten Staubsauger zu haben!

È la prima volta che acquisto un'aspirapolvere senza fili, ed ero molto dubbiosa, ma alla fine mi sono convinta.Pro: leggera, facile da montare e pulire, utilissima come aspirabriciole, sta in piedi da sola, luce a led fantastica che ti permette di vedere sporco che altrimenti non si vedrebbe ad occhio nudo, ricarica veloce e buona potenza di aspirazione, ottima a massima potenza.Contro: durata batteria alla massima potenza dura 20 minuti, per casa mia va benissimo, speriamo che duri. Comunque a potenza normale dura molto di più.Rapporto qualità prezzo ECCEZIONALE, mi sento di consigliarla a tutti.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets the job done for a low price!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this item to replace a similar product which was not light, quiet, nor wireless.This was the perfect buy for a small condo of 700sqft space. The suction ain't that great for big messes, but other than that it gets the job done. The battery will need to be charged after every use (depends on how long you use it for).Overall, great product, easy to assemble, light and quiet.
